content: Celebrate the 20th Anniversary since Sanny Builder's first release with the new Sanny Builder 4.2.0!.
CLEO 5.1.0 with new Input plugin is out! Download.
CLEO 5.0.3 with minor fixes is now available! Download.
CLEO 5 Released! Welcome to the new era of modding.
CLEO Redux 1.3.1 is out. Now with the portable version
Sanny Builder v4.1 development started! Learn more about new features here.
Somersault, a lightweight scripting language for GTA San Andreas, has been open sourced. Visit GitHub repo.
CLEO for III and Vice City updated to v2.1.1 with new opcodes and fixes. See change log for details.
CLEO Redux 1.3.0 with support for the latest GTA: The Trilogy patch is now available.
